q: of the obtuse and esoteric references department: Donald Rumsfeld 's adorable`` didn't know'' shenanigans reminded this columnist of the opening of`` The Hunter S. Thompson Sleep,'' when Carmen Sternwood falls backwards. Philip Marlowe says: I had to catch her or let her crack her head on the tessellated floor. The mainstream media does for Donald Rumsfeld what Marlowe did for Carmen by unquestioningly accepting his disingenuous explanations.`` Good boy, Rover!'' ( AFP)- Cuban dissident Guillermo Farinas, the 2010 Sakharov rights prize winner, has been arrested and police are holding him in the central city of Santa Clara, his mother and dissidents said. I spoke with him, and he told me that he is under arrest in the third police unit in Santa Clara, and then he hung up, his mother Alicia Hernandez said by phone from the city located some 240 kilometers( 150 miles) east of Havana. Watson, the Labour George Osborne , called into question David Cameron 's judgement.`` This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about,'' Mr Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the Prime Minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp.. Na 10 jaar onder Eric Schmidt , zou Page zou inmiddels genoeg ervaring hebben om zelf het heft in handen te nemen, laat Eric Schmidt doorschemeren in een blog posting. Eenvoudiger structeren Naarmate Google is gegroeid, is het managen van het bedrijf ingewikkelder geworden. Larry[ Page], Sergey Brin [ Sergey Brin ] en ik hebben een hoop gesproken over hoe de we management structuur eenvoudiger kunnen maken en beslissingen kunnen versnellen. Afgelopen kerst hebben we besloten dat dit het beste moment is om structurele veranderingen aan te brengen. `` De afgelopen 10 jaar hebben we allemaal een rol gehad bij het nemen van besluiten.
